pages.text: This material, crafted via $(thing)soul engulfing$(), can be used in a multitude of ways. One of the obvious applications is shaping it into tools and weapons. Curiously, this equipment has unique properties $(thing)depending on the type of soul it is empowered with$() from a carried $(item)soul crystal$(). It will also restore itself if tossed in soulfire.
Lastly, the $(item)wand$(). This tool is... special. (I don't know what it does.)
